name: Pet Furball
description:
Pet Furball v1.0.0
by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia
Released under the Cocoa Moss label

Soundtrack download

Pet Furball is a cute virtual pet featuring Furball, from Hyper Furball. It was developed in Fall 2015 in collaboration with Kat Jia, who provided artwork and design, and is available for download on iOS or Android platforms.

Download Pet Furball for your phone:
App Store (iOS)
Google Play (Android)
